remarks: Properties of the closure of the kernel of a functional.  (Contributed by NM, 1-Jan-2015.)
statement:
dochkrshp2.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dochkrshp2.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochkrshp2.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochkrshp2.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
dochkrshp2.y $e |- Y = ( LSHyp ` U ) $.
dochkrshp2.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` U ) $.
dochkrshp2.l $e |- L = ( LKer ` U ) $.
dochkrshp2.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
dochkrshp2.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. F ) $.
dochkrshp2 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( ._|_ ` ( ._|_ ` ( L ` G ) ) ) =/= V <-> ( ( ._|_ ` ( ._|_ ` ( L ` G ) ) ) = ( L ` G ) /\ ( L ` G ) e. Y ) ) ) $.
